channel.title: Internet problem, no DNS I think
channel.description:
Hello,
I think I don't have DNS working on my VM. Indeed, I can ping Google DNS server 8.8.8.8 but I can't reach any web page using Tor..
Do you know how I can resolve this ?
Thanks
